com.paypal.selion.platform.grid

Class AbstractTestSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.platform.grid.AbstractTestSession
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicTestSession, MobileTestSession, WebTestSession

    public abstract class AbstractTestSession
extends Object
    A class for loading and representing the WebTest/MobileTest annotation basic parameters. Also performs sanity checks. Concrete instances of this class are created via the TestSessionFactory factory.

      • initializeTestSession

        public abstract void initializeTestSession(InvokedMethodInformation method,
                         Map<String,com.paypal.selion.platform.grid.SeLionSession> sessionMap)
        A initializer that initializes the sub-class of AbstractTestSession based on the annotation.
        Parameters:
        method - - An InvokedMethodInformation object that represents the currently invoked method.
        sessionMap - - A Map of SeLionSession to be considered. This method is typically invoked when the annotation is capable of session management.

      • initializeTestSession

        public abstract void initializeTestSession(InvokedMethodInformation method)
        A initializer that initializes the sub-class of AbstractTestSession based on the annotation.
        Parameters:
        method - - An InvokedMethodInformation object that represents the currently invoked method. This method is typically invoked when the annotation doesn't deal with session management.
